Set of Extended Real Numbers

Source: R/Set_Interval_SpecialSet.R
ExtendedReals.Rd

The mathematical set of extended real numbers, defined as the union of the set of reals with \(\pm\infty\). i.e. $$R \cup \\{-\infty, \infty\\}$$ where \(R\) is the set of reals.

See also

Other special sets: Complex, Integers, Logicals, Naturals, NegIntegers, NegRationals, NegReals, PosIntegers, PosNaturals, PosRationals, PosReals, Rationals, Reals, Universal
